Action.author: krw910
Action.body: Blocked byÂ INDY-246. I need to be able to get up to 60,000 plus transactions in order to test this.

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: With a constant stream will will start to see a little slow down. I tested this with 200,000 transactions and ran a benchmark of sending 1,000 transactions at a time. It was slightly slower than the initial 1,000 transactions, but not significant enough to be an issue.
